tier_1_determinative.voluntary_causing_or_attempting_death_hu: assaulted the complainant and one another

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: Western Express Highway, Andheri Bridge, Andheri (East), Mumbai

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Akshay Eknath Kokate vs. State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Shaikh Abdul Kalam a/w Ms. Sana Shaikh
tier_4_procedural.sections_invoked: Sections 392 r/w 34 of the Indian Penal Code

residual_details.additional_facts: The applicant was identified in the Test Identification Parade. He purchased a motorcycle with the amount received. The applicant has been in custody since November 2017. The trial has not commenced, and no witnesses have been examined.
